sentences.en: an attenuated form of the polio virus
Attaching strings to your offer will attenuate your chance to sell off the goods.
sentences.cn: 在你们的报盘上增加附加条件就会减少你们售出货物的机会.
可减小管道及通风机的噪音.

sentences.en: Co - administration of Shuanghuanglian injection and Sanhuang capsule could attenuate the postoperative adhesion.
sentences.cn: 注射用双黄连与三黄胶囊联合用药可明显抑制肠粘连的形成.

sentences.en: Conclusion Acetazolamide can improve the mouse anti - anoxia ability and attenuate the swimming performance.
sentences.cn: 结论乙酰唑胺能提高小鼠机体 抗 常压的缺氧耐受能力和降低小鼠游泳耐力.

sentences.en: Conclusion sodium salicylate can par - tially attenuate the hearing loss caused by blast.
sentences.cn: 结论NaSA可部分减轻爆震所致的听力损失.

sentences.en: In a forest, wet wood and needles attenuate the signals.
sentences.cn: 在森林中, 潮湿的树木与针叶会使讯号变弱.

sentences.en: It is too significant, too attenuate.
sentences.cn: 这一切都太重要了, 太微小了.

sentences.en: Nitric Oxide Synthase ( NOS ) inhibitors attenuate or block morphine actions.
sentences.cn: 一氧化氮合酶 ( NOS ) 抑制剂可以减弱或阻断吗啡的作用.

sentences.en: Simvastatin may effectively attenuate DN progression through down - regulating the expression of TGF - � � via p 38 MAPK.
sentences.cn: 斯伐他汀可能通过抑制p38MAPK磷酸化而减少TGF - β的蛋白表达.

sentences.en: The attempts to attenuate this undesirable effect result in the deterioration of the robustness characteristics.
sentences.cn: 削弱这个令人不快的效果的尝试导致坚固的特性的变化.

sentences.en: The disks attenuate approximately 50 %, 75 % and 99 % of the signal, respectively.
sentences.cn: 这些盘衰减信号分别约为50%, 75%和99%.

sentences.en: The methods of Attenuate Total Reflection ( ATR ) and Transmission were appliedto analytical study in MIR.
sentences.cn: 中红外区域的分析研究采用了衰减全反射和透射两种方法.

sentences.en: The repetition of symbols was to be enough, without trauma, as well, perhaps, to attenuate it, or even jar it altogether loose from her memory.
sentences.cn: 象征的重复快要足够，即便没有可能的从她记忆中流出的创伤，去减弱它去刺激它。

sentences.en: The Wiz phenomenon : Once the Hypnotist Zone is activated , the activity level does not attenuate easily.
sentences.cn: 高人看著弟子们的脑部催眠区活跃著,是甚麽因素让这个区域持续活跃著?

sentences.en: Then we got involved with trying to find polymers that attenuate radiation.
sentences.cn: 接著我们致力于找出能够减弱辐射的聚合物.

sentences.en: You could never eliminate risk, but preparation and training could attenuate it.
sentences.cn: 风险不可能完全消除，但可以通过防范和培训来降低。

words.tran_cn: 使减弱；使变细；稀释（attenuate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to make something weaker or less
